short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time and learn faster. Reader Mode, quick summaries, and key concepts from Bevail.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browse Better with Bevail!

Enjoy a distraction-free browsing experience that makes you more productive. Bevail's text reader view brings productivity, personalization, and accessibility to the forefront of your online reading experience.

Key Features:

🧘 Simplify Your Reading Experience: Say goodbye to digital noise by activating reader mode. Remove all distractions such as ads, banners, videos, navigations, and buttons, and focus solely on what you came for the content.

🌳 Print What Matters: Be eco-friendly by only printing what you need. Remove unwanted elements and conserve paper and ink.

🕰️ Travel Back in Time: See the history of any webpage and access its archive to discover how it has evolved.

⏰ Know Your Reading Time: Never waste a minute again. Our reading time estimates empower you to decide whether the content is worth your precious time.

🎨 Customize Your View: Tailor your reading view to match your comfort. Choose from options like:
          🌙 Dark mode and other themes to match your aesthetic.
          🖋️ Preferred fonts and sizes to suit your eyes.
          📏 Page width and image display controls to fit your preferences.

🎧 Listen with Audio Versions: Convert any webpage into an auditory experience with audio controls like pause, rewind, fast forward, and start over. Accessibility made effortless.

🚀 Stay Tuned for New Features: We continually work to enhance your reading experience. Keep an eye out for exciting new features coming soon.

 Bevail is designed with you in mind, making online reading more productive, accessible, and enjoyable. Don't let distractions hold you back – click the "Add to Chrome" button now and redefine your reading journey!
